entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:28 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 08:50 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: E 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of thunderstorms this evening and after midnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 11.
